data.name: Trainz Plus DLC - Leadville Subdivision
data.detailed_description:
Leadville Subdivision is a connection track between two main lines which are owned and operated by UP and BNSF. The subdivision is mostly single track until Dayton, where the track remains doubled until the city of Leadville – home of BNSF’s rail yard and the end of the subdivision.

Both railways have trackage rights on the Leadville Sub for exchanging rail cars at each yard, or serving their customers on the line. Under agreement between UP and BNSF railways, Port Eagle is also served by both railways to ensure trains keep moving.

Enjoy the scenery of the Midwest.
data.about_the_game:
Leadville Subdivision is a connection track between two main lines which are owned and operated by UP and BNSF. The subdivision is mostly single track until Dayton, where the track remains doubled until the city of Leadville – home of BNSF’s rail yard and the end of the subdivision.

Both railways have trackage rights on the Leadville Sub for exchanging rail cars at each yard, or serving their customers on the line. Under agreement between UP and BNSF railways, Port Eagle is also served by both railways to ensure trains keep moving.

Enjoy the scenery of the Midwest.
data.short_description: A rural and largely single track connection between UP and BNSF owned main lines.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
